name: Graphic Packaging Holding Company
description: Graphic Packaging Holding Company is a leading provider of paper-based packaging solutions for a variety of products, primarily in the food and beverage sectors. Founded in 2007 and headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, GPK specializes in the manufacture of folding cartons, paperboards, and other packaging products that are designed to be sustainable and environmentally friendly. The company has a strong commitment to reducing its carbon footprint, utilizing renewable resources, and implementing recycling initiatives. GPK serves a diverse range of customers, including major brands in the food, beverage, and consumer goods industries, providing innovative packaging solutions that enhance product shelf appeal while ensuring sustainability. Through technological advancements, GPK focuses on improving packaging performance and efficiency, offering products that meet the evolving needs of its customers. The company has made significant investments in modernizing its manufacturing processes and expanding its production capabilities to better serve its clients and respond to market demands. GPK's mission is to provide superior packaging solutions that drive customer success while maintaining a strong environmental stewardship.
